item.title: Inflation cools in first full month of Trump term but egg prices soar
item.description: Inflation report arrives as markets slide and recession fears grow.

item.title: Department of Education lays off nearly 50% of its workforce
item.description: Mass layoffs are impacted 1,315 employees of the Department of Education, sources told ABC News.

item.title: WATCH: Aliens are real and there’s a government cover-up, new documentary claims
item.description: “Age of Disclosure” features 30 U.S. officials speaking out on the alleged existence of aliens and UFOs.
